info.notes: First release from the Universal Century timeline. Features the Core Block Transformation and Combination System. Includes fully transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter, a non-transformable Core Block, and an Amuro Ray figurine. Kits from RG-01 to RG-13 use a base adapter that is compatible with Action Base 2 only.
First Zeon MS in the series. Features a gear mechanism that moves the monoeye when the head is turned sideways. Includes Char Aznable figurine.
First release from the Cosmic Era timeline. Includes Kira Yamato figurine.
Parts and color variant of RG-02. Includes left open hand, right trigger hand, and Zeon pilot figurine.
Includes Kira Yamato figurine. Full Burst Effect Parts were later sold separately for this kit.
First RG add-on release. Includes Sword and Launcher Striker Packs for RG-03 and Striker Pack hanger for Action Base.
Includes Titans pilot figurine and optional parts to recreate "test" version. Shield features missile pod as seen in the Zeta Gundam compilation films.
Color variant of RG-07 without optional parts. Includes Kamille Bidan figurine. Originally planned to be released simultaneously with RG-07, but mold defects caused a delayed release date.
Includes Athrun Zala figurine. Includes prop stand for Fatum-00 unit when attached to the Gundam in a standing pose.

First transformable MS in the RG series. Shield features missile pod as seen in the Zeta Gundam compilation films. Includes grenade launcher packs, Action Base 2 adapter for MS and Wave Rider modes and Kamille Bidan figurine.
Released to coincide with the Gundam SEED Destiny HD Remaster. Includes Shinn Asuka figurine.
Features the Core Block Transformation and Combination System. Includes fully transformable FF-XII Core Fighter II and Kou Uraki (EFSF uniform) figurine.
Parts variant of RG-12. Includes fully transformable FF-XII-Fb Core Fighter II Full Burnern and Kou Uraki (flight jacket) figurine.

First RG kit with gold-colored Advanced MS Joint parts and chrome plated parts. Also the first RG kit to use a base adapter that is compatible with both Action Base 1 and 2, as well as peg-based display stands. Includes Kira Yamato figurine.
First release from the Anno Domini timeline. Includes Setsuna F. Seiei figurine.
First and only aquatic MS in the RG line. Includes Char Aznable figurine.

info.series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
info.notes: First release from the After Colony timeline. Includes Heero Yuy figurine.
Includes parts to create the 00 Raiser GN Condenser Type from Mobile Suit Gundam 00 The Movie -A wakening of the Trailblazer-, Setsuna F. Seiei and Saji Crossroad figurines.
First RG kit released from a side story manga. Also the first RG kit to feature multicolor MS Joint parts. Features chrome plated "Gerbera Straight" katana. Includes Lowe Guele figurine.

info.series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
info.notes: Parts and color variant of RG-17. Fully transformable kit. Includes Action Base 2 adapter for Bird Mode and Heero Yuy figurine. Also includes attachment part for the Monthly Gundam ACE February 2015 exclusive Drei Zwerg kit.

info.series: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 The Movie -A wakening of the Trailblazer-
info.notes: Includes clear adjustable stand for GN Sword V in buster rifle mode and Setsuna F. Seiei figurine.
Third non-Gundam release. Features gloss coating and gold chrome plated parts. Includes Full Frontal figurine.

name: GAT-X105B/FP Build Strike Gundam Full Package

info.notes: First release from the Build Fighters timeline. Also the first RG kit to have bilingual Japanese/English text on its box packaging and instruction manual. Uses the B, C, and F plate runners of RG-03. Includes Sei Iori figurine.

name: MBF-P01-Re2AMATU Gundam Astray Gold Frame Amatsu Mina

info.notes: Parts and color variant of RG-19. Features gloss coated armor parts. Includes clear adjustable stand for "Magashira no Hoko" Harpoon and Rondo Mina Sahaku figurine.

Transforms from Unicorn Mode to Destroy Mode with minor parts-forming on the head and feet. MS Joint features clear colored parts. Includes optional non-transformable antennas in Unicorn and Destroy Modes and Banagher Links figurine. Released to coincide with the grand opening of The Gundam Base Tokyo and as part of the Gunpla Evolution Project.
Parts and color variant of RG-02. Includes Johnny Ridden figurine.

Parts and color variant of RG-25 with yellow psychoframe. Transforms from Unicorn Mode to Destroy Mode with minor parts-forming on the head and feet. MS Joint features clear colored parts. Includes optional non-transformable antennas in Unicorn and Destroy Modes and Riddhe Marcenas figurine. As an undocumented feature, includes all parts to create RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee featured in Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn (Novel), which can be built by following RG-25's instructions for all steps except for the head.

info.series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
info.notes: Includes Zechs Merquise figurine and additional clear blades for the beam sabers.

Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Char's Counterattack and as part of Bandai's "UC NexT 0100" project. Features "Invoke Mode" originally introduced in the MG Ver.Ka kit. Includes Char Aznable (Neo Zeon Normal Suit) figurine. Initial release includes Universal Century New Gunpla Book magazine. First RG release to be packaged in a double size box similar to a Master Grade model.
Enhanced version of RG-25 with green psychoframe. Includes Hyper Beam Javelin. Largest and most expensive RG retail kit to date.
First release from the Late Universal Century timeline. Includes fully transformable Core Fighter, Anti-Beam Coating Cloak, and Kincade Nau figurine. Released as part of the Gunpla Evolution Project.
Includes Amuro Ray (Londo Bell Normal Suit) figurine and custom Action Base adapter.

Can be separated into Chest Flyer and Leg Flyer. Includes transformable YFX-M56S Core Splendor, Silhouette Flyer, two Action Base adapters for MS mode/Leg Flyer and Chest Flyer, and Shinn Asuka figurine.
Includes display base and Char Aznable figurine.

info.series: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children

info.notes: Limited first press release of RG-25 with exclusive box cover featuring Unicorn Gundam in Unicorn Mode.

name: RX-0[N] Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee Norn [Premium "Unicorn Mode" Box]

info.notes: Limited first press release of RG-27 with exclusive box cover featuring Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee Norn in Unicorn Mode.

info.series: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn - Bande Dessinee
info.notes: Limited edition re-release of RG-25 with a color variant of RG-27's Armed Armor DE.

Limited edition parts variant of RG-25 with blue psychoframe. Includes new tail stabilizers for Armed Armor DE units. Bundled with limited first press release of Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn Blu-ray BOX Complete Edition.

name: RX-93 ν Gundam Fin Funnel Effect Set

info.notes: Limited edition re-release of RG-32. Includes a clear Action Base 4 and two Figure-rise Effect Jet Effect (Clear Yellow).

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Last Shooting MSN-02 Zeong Effect Set

info.notes: Special release of RG-34 with effect parts, fixed shooting hands and damaged parts for RG-01, grey Action Base 5 and two of "30 Minute Missions Customize Scene Base (Display)".
Gunpla Expo World Tour 2011 exclusive clear armor variant of RG-01.
P-Bandai exclusive re-release of RG-03 without the AQM/E-X01 Aile Striker.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-03 without the AQM/E-X01 Aile Striker.
P-Bandai exclusive re-release of accessories originally from HGUC-35 and HGUC-53 with additional marking sheet. Includes adapter to fit G-Defenser into the backpack of RG-07/RG-08.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-05.

Gundam Front Tokyo exclusive re-release of RG-01 with a BA-1 display base and adapter to replicate the floating pose on the venue's promotional posters, as well as Magnetic Coating joint parts, a floating Amuro Ray figurine, and an extra marking sheet of the 1/1 scale Gundam statue's 2012 livery.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-09.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-03 with accessory originally offered in HGSEED MSV-01.

name: MS-06S Zaku II (Char Aznable's Custom) Ver.GFT

info.notes: Gundam Front Tokyo exclusive gloss color variant of RG-02, with an additional marking sheet.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-10, uses duplicate runners to achieve the proper color scheme. Includes custom marking sheet.

name: ZGMF-X42S Destiny Gundam Effect Unit Wing of Light

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive effects kit for RG-11.

name: ZGMF-X42S-REVOLUTION Destiny Gundam Heine Westenfluss Color Ver.

info.notes: Gunpla Expo World Tour 2013 exclusive color variant of RG-11.

info.notes: San Diego Comic-Con International 2013 exclusive color variant of RG-04. Includes additional marking sheet.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-11.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-14.

name: GNR-001E GN Arms Type-E [Real Color Ver.]

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit for RG-15. Color variant of HG00-13 without Gundam Exia, comes with additional marking sheet.
P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit to convert RG-15 into GN-001RE Gundam Exia Repair.

name: GN-001 Gundam Exia (Trans-Am Mode) Gloss Injection Ver.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-15.
P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit to convert RG-15 into GNY-001 Gundam Astraea.

name: 1/144 RX-78-2 Gundam & 1/35 MS-06S Char's Zaku II Head [Premium Ver.]

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive boxed set containing pearl color variant of RG-01 and 1/35 scale MS-06S Zaku II head (parts and color variant of Zaku head from UCHG-02). Includes hilltop display base.

name: ZGMF-X20A Strike Freedom Gundam Clear Color Ver.

info.notes: Chara Hobby 2014 C3×HOBBY exclusive clear color variant of RG-14.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-01.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-15 and RG GNY-001 Gundam Astraea. Includes parts to create GNY-001F2 Gundam Astraea Type F2.

name: XXXG-00W0 Wing Gundam Zero EW Option Parts for Twin Buster Rifle

info.series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
info.notes: Gundam ACE February 2015 issue exclusive accessory kit for RG-17. Includes Messer Zwerg/Drei Zwerg Buster and support stand.

name: XXXG-00W0 Wing Gundam Zero EW Expansion Effect Unit "Seraphim Feather"

info.series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive effects kit for RG-17. Includes a clear black Action Base 3.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-01.

name: GN-0000+GNR-010 Trans-Am Raiser Gloss Injection Ver.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-18.
The Art of Gundam Exhibit exclusive clear color variant of RG-01.

info.notes: Chara Hobby 2015 C3×HOBBY exclusive gloss color variant of RG-17.

Gunpla Expo World Tour 2015 exclusive clear color variant of RG GN-0000+GNR-010 Trans-Am Raiser Gloss Injection Ver..

name: MSZ-006-3 Zeta Gundam III Ver.GFT Limited Color

info.series: Competition of New Gundam - Red or White -
info.notes: Gundam Front Tokyo exclusive color variant of RG-10. Fully transformable kit.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-19, with "Gerbera Straight" katana replaced by recoilless rifle. Comes with Gai Murakumo figurine.

info.series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED/Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny
info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit for RG-05, RG-09, and RG-14, originally released with HGSEED-16. Includes additional marking sheet.

name: MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame Plated Ver.

info.notes: C3 Hong Kong 2016 and C3 Tokyo 2016 exclusive color chrome plated variant of RG-19.

name: ZGMF-X42S-REVOLUTION Destiny Gundam Heine Westenfluss Color Plated Ver.

info.notes: Mobile Suit Gundam EXTREME VS-FORCE exclusive color chrome plated variant of RG ZGMF-X42S-REVOLUTION Destiny Gundam Heine Westenfluss Color Ver. Offered as a prize for Mobile Suit Gundam EXTREME VS-FORCE Limited Gunpla Gift Campaign. Limited to 100 units.

P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-19, with "Gerbera Straight" katana replaced by the "Gáe Bulg" rail bazooka. Comes with Rondo Gina Sahaku figurine. Includes stub piece to replicate unit with missing right arm.

name: MSZ-006-3 Zeta Gundam III Ver.GFT Limited Clear Color

info.series: Competition of New Gundam - Red or White -
info.notes: Gundam Front Tokyo exclusive clear color variant of RG MSZ-006-3 Zeta Gundam III Ver.GFT. Fully transformable kit.

info.series: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 The Movie -A wakening of the Trailblazer-
info.notes: Gunpla Expo World Tour 2016 exclusive clear color variant of RG-21.

P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit for RG-22. Includes two Rocket Bazookas (taken from BPSW-007), Beam Axe effect parts, additional hands, battle damaged head as seen in episode 3, and Daguza Mackle figurine.
Gunpla Expo World Tour 2016 exclusive parts variant of RG-18. Released as a P-Bandai exclusive in December 2016. Includes clear adjustable stand for GN Buster Sword II.

name: GN-001 Gundam Exia Trans-Am Clear Ver.

info.notes: Gunpla Expo World Tour 2016 exclusive clear color variant of RG GN-001 Gundam Exia (Trans-Am Mode) Gloss Injection Ver..

name: MBF-P03 Gundam Astray Blue Frame Plated Ver.

info.notes: Gunpla Expo World Tour 2016 exclusive color variant of RG-19. Color chrome plated variant of RG MBF-P03 Gundam Astray Blue Frame.
P-Bandai exclusive parts variant of RG-15.
P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit for RG-15, HG00-01 and other Celestial Being models. Manufactured by MegaHouse under their Realistic Model Series banner.
P-Bandai exclusive re-release of RG-21 with GN Sword IV Full Saber.

name: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam Head Display Base (Metallic Pearl Finish)

info.notes: Gundam ACE September 2017 issue exclusive pearl color variant of the 1/48 scale transformable Unicorn Gundam bust display base originally offered in the January 2010 issue of Dengeki Hobby. Compatible with HGUC-100/101 and RG-25.
The Gundam Base Tokyo and The Gundam Base Online Shop exclusive metallic color variant of RG-22.

name: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II RG Limited Color Ver.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-08 in RX-78-2 Gundam colors and Amuro Ray markings.

name: MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam RG Limited Color Ver.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-10 with Amuro Ray markings.

The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive color variant of RG-25 with new backpack side thrusters and hands to replicate The Life Sized Unicorn Gundam Statue, plus white BA-G display base to promote "Gundam Unicorn World". Uses duplicate E plate runner in light gray and H plate runner with navy blue backpack and foot parts. Includes expanded marking sheet.

name: MBF-P01-ReAMATU Gundam Astray Gold Frame Amatsu

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts variant of RG-24. Includes parts to create MBF-P01-ReAMATU Gundam Astray Gold Frame Amatsu (Incomplete).

name: GAT-X105B/FP Build Strike Gundam Full Package (RG System Image Color)

info.notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo and P-Bandai exclusive pearl and sparkle clear color variant of RG-23.

name: MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame Ver. GUNDAM docks at Taiwan

Gunpla Expo World Tour 2017 exclusive clear color variant of RG-22.

name: XXXG-00W0 Wing Gundam Zero EW [Clear Color]

info.notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive clear color variant of RG-17. Includes clear blue BA-G display base.

P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-26.

name: MS-06R-1A Black Tri-Stars Zaku II (Triple Set)

info.notes: P-Bandai Japan exclusive boxed set containing three units of the Black Tri-Stars Zaku II High Mobility Type with a Triple Action Base.
P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-04.

name: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam (Destroy Mode) Ver.TWC [Lighting Model]

info.notes: The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive re-release of RG-25 with LED inner frame in place of the original Advanced MS Framework. Non-transformable stationary kit. Uses the XA1 plate runner of the 2017 RX-0 Unicorn Gundam Ver.TWC kit. Includes display base that holds three AAA batteries (not included).
The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive gold chrome plated variant of RG-25 with yellow psychoframe. Released to commemorate the first anniversary of the store.
Gundam Ace November 2018 issue exclusive accessory kit for RG-29 and HGUC-215.

P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-26.
P-Bandai exclusive parts variant of RG-15.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-24.

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-28. Includes Zechs Merquise (Preventers suit) figurine.
P-Bandai exclusive metallic color variant of RG-29.

P-Bandai exclusive parts variant of RG-03 bundled with Sword and Launcher Striker Packs from RG-06. Features Extended Battery Pack and new hardpoints on the Aile Striker, as well as revised waist inner frame to account for the weight of equipments.

name: Expansion Parts for ν Gundam Double Fin Funnel Custom Unit

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit to convert RG-32 into RX-93 ν Gundam Double Fin Funnel Type. Includes clear display arms, an Amuro insignia display base from MG-095, and water slide decal sheet for RG-32.
The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive color variant of RG GNT-0000/FS 00 Qan[T] Full Saber [Clear Color].
P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-031 with Shot Lancer. Includes Zabine Chareux figurine.
bilibili exclusive color variant of RG-25 with blue psychoframe. Limited to 10000 units; available through lottery sale. Released to celebrate the 10th anniversary of bilibili.
P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-26. Includes water slide decal sheet.
The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive metallic color variant of RG-32.

P-Bandai exclusive parts and color variant of RG-25 with blue psychoframe. Features gold chrome plated armors. Without transformable antennas, unlike previous RG-25 variants. Released to commemorate the 10th anniversary of P-Bandai.
P-Bandai exclusive metallic color variant of RG-31.

name: RX-93 ν Gundam [Clear Color] Limited Package

info.notes: Theater and The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive clear color variant of RG-32 with limited first press release box cover. Released for the theatrical premiere of Mobile Suit Gundam: Hathaway's Flash.

P-Bandai exclusive metallic color variant of RG-11.
P-Bandai exclusive metallic color variant of RG-22.
The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive color variant of RG RX-0 Unicorn Gundam Perfectibility originally bundled with Gundam Unicorn Blu-ray Box.
Events exclusive boxed set containing BMC-04, HGUC-021, and RG-01 with clear color armor parts. Released to coincide with the 40th anniversary of Gunpla.

name: HWS Expansion Set for RX-93 ν Gundam

info.notes: P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit to convert RG-32 into FA-93HWS ν Gundam Heavy Weapons System Type.
P-Bandai exclusive color variant of RG-32 with parts from HWS Expansion Set for RX-93 ν Gundam.
The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive re-release of RG GN-001 Gundam Exia Trans-Am Clear Ver. with sparkle green display base.
The Gundam Base Tokyo exclusive re-release of RG GN-0000+GNR-010 00 Raiser Trans-Am Clear Ver. with sparkle green display base.
